Welcome to my personal page!

## Projects

- [libdsp](https://github.com/Segfault1602/libdsp): Simple C++ audio dsp library.
- [BowedVst](https://github.com/Segfault1602/BowedVst) Polyphonic bowed string VST using JUCE.
- [LinnLED](https://github.com/Segfault1602/LinnLED): Python scripts used to configure the LED on the Linnstrument to match microtonal scales.
- [Daisy Patch for VCV Rack](https://github.com/Segfault1602/vcv_daisypatch): Implementation of the [Daisy Patch](https://www.electro-smith.com/daisy/patch) eurorack module in VCV Rack. Allows easy prototyping of firmware for the Daisy Patch in VCV Rack.
